summary:
A 3 cell player house in the dwemer style. This is a vanilla skyrim mod. includes dwemer farmhouse, with small sitting garden, a display room, temple, crafting area, stables and a jacuzzi.
What does a female Dragonborn do when your queen of the thieves guild, the Night Mother's favorite speaker, Arch-Mage of Winterhold, Member of Companio
descriptionHtml:
This is a 3 cell player house in dwemerand with a little Whiterun and Jorvaskr style. On the ground level,
you have two stables for Shadowmere. The tower has a balcony. Inside
is the first floor / house with a small sitting garden. The east
hallway leads to the display cell. the hallway to the west takes you
to the lift down to the crafting zone.
the house cell has 11 clothes/book/safechests, 1 jewelry box. all norespawns.
The display cell has 52 mannequins, 88weapon racks, 13 weapon shield plaques, 8 dagger displays, 20 weapon
display cases. A small temple with 9 shrines and one spare room,
Which i call the junk room. A bad habit i picked up from the
Rieklings on the island of Solstheim.
The crafting zone has 10 Armour chest,9 hold chest, 1 artifact chest, 15 player chest, 16 dwe chest, 18
food barrels, 7 soul gem chest, 1 potions, 1 staves, 1 recipes, 1
jewelry, 1 enchanted jewelry, 1 scrolls, 3 mines for each ore. 1
spell tomes, 1 enchanted weapon/Armour, 1 gem stones chest. and 1
merchant/blacksmith. she does move around in the cell, you may have
to look for her. i have seen her in the jacuzzi.
This place is on the world map and cantravel to it any time, it's in the Falkreath hold, southeast of
Helgen, southwest of Southfringe Sanctum.

Things i have notice, when entering thetower open the wall chest so the items on shelf can settle and do the
same in the bedroom. when entering the display cell, wait till after
the auto save is done before moving around. all weapon racks work,
mannequins do move a little but only on their rugs, they float up
sometimes or disappear/to fix take a item off of them and put it back
on. but none of the stuff Iâ€™ve put on them has disappear or is
gone. the Skull of Corruption and Volendrung won't stay in the weapon
racks, but volendrung will stay in the weapon shield plaque by itself
with shield. i just lean skull of corruption up against the racks. No
problems with follower following you around from cell to cell.
author: Blutregen
